result.execSummary:
The defendant Cynthia R Watkins was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Carry Concealed Weapon, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 941.23(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:

Court ordered the defendant to provide a DNA sample.

with credit for 3 days. TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Cynthia R Watkins

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.

AS TO COUNT 1: Court sentences defendant to serve 3 days in the House of Correction with credit for 3 days, consecutive to any other sentence, a TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.  Court ordered defendant to pay a fine of $50.00 plus all applicable court costs, fees and surcharges by 11/28/16 or the nonpayment penalty will be immediate entry of a civil judgment.  Court ordered defendant to provide a DNA sample.

Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.

Defendant Cynthia R Watkins in court with attorney Scott Douglas Connors.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.
Case calendared for plea/sentencing hearing.

AS TO COUNT 1: Defendant changes plea to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty. Court found that defendant freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights. Plea questionnaire, addendum and elements received and filed. Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea. Court found defendant guilty as charged in the criminal complaint and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.

Defendant Cynthia R Watkins in court with attorney Scott Douglas Connors.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 37.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 27, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Cynthia R Watkins not in court when case was called. Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. For reasons stated on the record as to defendant possibly retaining Attorney Scott Connors at today's proceedings.   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until next scheduled hearing.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Daniel E Meylink in court.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.  Case calendared for status conference.
Defendant does not appear.  Defense request Court impose and stay a warrant.  State has no objection.  Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until next court date.  Calendar call scheduled for October 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Cynthia R Watkins in court with attorney Daniel E Meylink.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. Attorney just retained, need to obtain discovery from prior counsel.   Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37.   Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for September 28, 2015 at 08:30 am.
-From Attorney Daniel Meylink on behalf of his client; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Cynthia R Watkins in court with attorney Torrie R. Williams.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Defense counsel has received discovery and offer.    Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 29, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Cynthia R Watkins in court with attorney Colin McGinn for attorney Torrie R. Williams.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Pre-trial conference held off the record. Attorney Torrie R. Williams is unavailable for today's proceedings. Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 37. Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Status conference scheduled for June 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.

No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  
Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Cynthia R Watkins in court with attorney Terese M. Dick.  Defendant Cynthia R Watkins in custody.  
Grant Ian Huebner appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  

Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  
Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  
Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
